caption.p: Fungal community matrix (read numbers of fungal OTUs in each sample in a dataset downsampled to a median of 16,024 reads). Each row represents an OTU, each column represents a sample. T0 = control sampling before decapitation, T1, T2, T3, and T4 = samplings at 2, 4, 10, and 15 months after decapitation, respectively, C, control spruce seedlings sampled 2â€“15 months after decapitation; B, bare forest soil; W, coase woody debris; Z, ericoid shrubs.
